alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 11:10PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Broome, southeastern Tioga and southwestern Chenango Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1110 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Owego, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Kirkwood, Conklin, Maine, Owego, Sanford and Deposit. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 7. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 64 and 84. Interstate 88 between 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
